caption: Great spot to grab a beer before a ballgame or just hang out on a Saturday afternoon! Hadn’t been here since pre-COVID but the ordering experience was great (order from your table on your mobile phone). Service was fast and attentive and the pretzels were bomb!
Love this place! Have the best customer service, good vibes and excellent beer! Highly recommend 10/10
Had two great beers and a yummy pretzel. My triple dry hopped IPA was awesome, seems like they had some more great options for IPA lovers too.

I usually enjoy only one or two beers at any given brewery. However, with this place I liked everything that I ordered from the beer to the food. You really cannot go wrong with anything you order. And to top it off, we had an attentive waiter. I can only hope that they consider opening earlier on game days.
Such an amazing environment!! Great people, great food!! Can’t wait to visit again!!
Terrible service.

A solid place by Ocean Beach and Golden Gate Park to grab a beer and a burger. You can sit outside and enjoy the sunlight (when it's not fogged in, of course) as you await your order from the bar so order a drink there too. The food is good, but the service lags as if they never have enough servers. Be prepared to wait.
Came here to grab some beers for take out. Wish they had some stouts.
Consistency in their quality beer making is always on point.  Now offering a cider that is on par with the large variety of beers offered.
Amazing place. Good beer!

I’ve been here several times over the past few years, and was never really impressed. Last night, however, I became impressed. I had a glass of Bigbee (Belgian strong) and loved it, followed by Malibu’s Most Wanted (fruited stout on nitro), …
Great staff, good beer, and great atmosphere! This place give you the feeling of always having a comfortable spot to go and meet friends for a pint.
Great beer. Perfect bar food
I thought their range was excellent, quite different flavours instead of the bland stuff I was finding in some places super friendly and knowledgeable staff
Server was the happiest fellow we saw all day, and the beer was great! They let us try many tasters so we’d find just the right one.

Beer here is solid. they know what they are doing in this regard (I have been to many micro-breweries throughout the country and the product here ranks well). What was really off-putting was the bar-tender this evening. His only priority …
They brew everything here. New beers every now and then

(Translated by Google) Beer is delicious shop.  Friendly but not too early to close.  Beer is really !! Really delicious place !!!  (Original) 맥주가 맛있는 가게.  친절하지만 너무 일찍 문 닫는게 아쉬운 곳.  맥주는 정말 !! 정말 맛있는 곳!!!
Neighborhood brewery with a cool vibe and great selection.
Great beer, great service.
Nice beer. Food ok

Great brewery stop.  Friendly employees and the brewmaster was talkative and full of info if she happens to be there when you come by.  Lots of options on the beers in quite a few styles, and they do pints to go, which is awesome.  They also have some food, but I didn't try any.
Chill place for good beers, no BS. Friendly staff, unjudging eyes for those who have nothing to prove about wanting to try new beers.
Loved this place. Great beer, good vibe
Good light grub and good beer (to go containers too).
Good stuff! Standard open space brewery with horrible acoustics but killer beer. Great bartenders, friendly service, excellent breadth of styles.

I pretty much wrote Local Brewing off when I came here shortly after they opened. That was a huge mistake. I tried some more of their beer maybe a year later and I was blown away.  Since then, I've been coming back on a regular basis and …

I want to recognize Local Brewing as a really great San Francisco brewery. We went a couple years ago and most of the beers didn't really suit us, but in the past year we've just been so impressed with their beers.  These pictures are from …
(Translated by Google) I recommend sour ale  (Original) 俺はサワーエールがオススメ
Super unique selection of beers. Nobody else is doing what they are!
Loved it.
Awesome beer! Great variety and quality. Cool bartender that was excited to talk beer and the SF area. Can see why locals would live it and why tourist would feel comfortable. 100% visit again.
Great beers and nice server!
Good fresh food including veggie options and the best beer in the city.
Delicious berry sour beer.
Good beer.  Limited menu.  Service was good.   Nice "local" place.
Frendly staff. No waiting time .
Super nice bartender and the beers(ordered a flight) were decent.
Fantastic bar! Everything you'd want from a microbrewery with a limited food menu. Great place fo beer and bites. They always have rotating taps of delicious brews, and a fantastic staff!
Shangai beer was amazing

(Translated by Google) The brewery is located in a good area. The beers really are amazing, and you can buy some cans to go. Excellent!  (Original) La cervecería está ubicada en una buena zona. Las cervezas realmente son increibles, y podés comprar algunas latas para llevar. Excelente!
Glen Park IPA 6.5 of 1 to 10  Duboce IPA 6.0 w a little detectable Listerine-like astringency that makes it seem like something is eating the enamel off my teeth.  Maybe half of one,...
Good selection of beer. Small kitchen but very delicious.  Try SF lager!

Great local beer spot, with a small menu that has all the staples you could want, as long as you want meat. My only complaint is that the menu doesn’t have great non-meat variety, but the beer selection is epic and the meats are delicious.
Cozy place and interesting beer options

Always a good selection of beer and one of our most trusted places to grab a drink in soma. I wouldn’t call it a destination, but if you’re in the area and looking for good beer and a little food it’s a great spot.
Great beers

Local Brewing has an amazing lineup of craft beers. They make all the beer styles you can imagine, including at least 3 different IPAs, including those trendy hazy/juicy IPAs. Their barrel-aged program is also fantastic with both …
Nice, friendly place with some variety in their tap list.
Friendly bartenders that know the beers. If you don't know what you want they can help.
Mediocre food, bartenders often too distracted to serve - left unserved more than once after a ten minute wait at the bar.  Good beer when I've had it, but pretty hard to get it served.
Their hazy IPA is amazing.
Superb crafted beers for everyone. My favorite is Big Mo, IPA, but they have hoppier beers and saisons and lagers. Clientele and bar staff friendly. Food choice are tasty.

About 15 beers on tap, wonderful selection and guidance to try and choose their on-site brews. 6 beer flight of your choice, which is a nice change from ore-selected flights. No food. Close to Caltrain station, this is a frequent "wait for the train" stop for us.
A large selection of quality regular beer fortified with a regular offering of new beers. Friendly helpful staff is the cherry on top. I don't live in town but i have to stop by when I'm in SF.
Busy at times but good variety of beer types and serve some food too (mostly snacks, sandwiches and sausages in buns including a tasty apple/sage veggie option).
I like this place a lot. Tasty beer, small kitchen, and really nice people. They've always done a good job making sure I leave happy.
Loved it. Great beer good food.
Good beer, excellent music, nice people and no tv blaring in your face!!! Favorite brewery in SF
Excellent beers an very knowledgeable staff.
One of the best craft breweries in the city. Well balanced taps, more than just an IPA house.

Good beer, but no food and minimal service.  One of my pet peeves is suggesting 18, 20, or 25 percent tip when it took me 10 minutes to get served a short pour.   I'll write it off to one bartender having a busy night, but it doesn't make me want to go back anytime soon.
Great beers and really cool bar/brewery, but unfriendly and arrogant staff.
Great place to catch a beer with friends!  The food is surprisingly good too!
Out of the ordinary artsy vibe for a brewery. Tucked away down Bluxome. The "in the family" that uses weed for hops is out of this world.
Kind of in the middle of nowhere round SOMA but great vibes and they have a new cannabis beer (in the family). Recommend getting the tasting flight.
Good place for a beer before the Giants' game
Cool staff and great beer. The Bluxome Black was excellent.
Great drinks⋯
Great beer.  Helpful staff.  Perfect place for a casual drink with friends
Cool brewery atmosphere in the heart of SF. Bartenders were fun. Beer was good.

Beertenders are great. Brewmaster or bearded staff man is a bit pompous and rude---believes his seat at the bar trumps paying customers. Beers are quite good but don't stand out amongst the many many breweries around town. Great brewery atmosphere and they serve food (though pricey for the portion size).
Nice people, good food, great beer, tasteful music.
One of the best breweries in the city. Great selection of rotating beers on tap, with great people to help you find your way.
Great beer, great service, price is right. My favorite micro brewery in the city
If you haven't been here recently come back... they are hitting craft beer home runs regularly.  Stop in before Giants games, 1 1/2 blocks from Caltrain. Delicious sausages and sandos
The beer was great, just don't try the pretzels.
We visited from Phoenix last weekend and toured/tasted with Vantigo! Great day- really good variety of beers in a fun atmosphere
Good selection of beers and cool rustic brewery.
Really liked the dark lager!
Make it clear that you do not allow outside food in your establishment.
Good beer and snacks. Really a lively spot.
Great people, great beer, great vibe.
Lots of IPAs and flights!!! Not my favorite beer but open atmosphere
Clean, no frills, good selection (with plenty of 10 oz taster options).  A beer drinker's Nirvana.
Good beer at fair prices along with nice snacks in this sparsely decorated off the beaten path brewery.
I love this place, especialy crew!
Good tunes, good brews.
Solid beers and lots of choices in a bar that sits among the brewing equipment itself. Definitely get the sampler and try a handful of their suggestions.
Awesome beer!
Great location for a Giants' game, and great atmosphere.  However, the beers are not quite up to the quality of other craft breweries in The City.
Awesome beer brewed there! You can see the equipment and all... Amazing snacks and such a good environment. And so close to the Caltrain!
Awesome venue, great beer, great service
Found this gem yesterday afternoon. Great atmosphere. Fun place.
